str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To weep, weep for, mourn, lament. Of uncertain affinity; to sob, i.e. Wail aloud.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From peri and pateo; to tread all around, i.e. Walk at large; figuratively, to live, deport oneself, follow.
Hated, hostile; subst: an enemy. From a primary echtho; hateful; usually as a noun, an adversary.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
